channel.title: How do you get the scar script to draw things!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
I saw it before, in the 2.03 tutorial with the bulldowzer, but i never understood how to do it. Does anyone else get the fast draw function?????!?!?!?!?!?!?!
PLEASE HELP!!!!
Cause i could make this awsome scrip then
